We're Different. We're founders.

Blue Star Innovation Partners (“BSIP”) is a growth equity firm founded and run by founders focused on software and technology businesses.

Investment Criteria

$3M–$25M
ARR

Scale

B2B SaaS

Tech–Enabled Services

FinTech

Focus Areas

Control
Recapitalization

Transaction Types

Built by Founders,
For Founders

There’s a reason founders partner with us.

We understand how to work with founders and CEOs because we are founders and CEOs ourselves. Our experience allows us to assist with every aspect of building and selling software companies, from product, go-to-market and M&A.

We view our investments through the lens of founders – because that’s who we are. We back all this up by investing our own money in every deal, and we look for founders who are interested in rolling significant equity and help build the business alongside us.

How We Help

We don't just provide capital—we help founders turn strong businesses
into category leaders. Here's how:

01
Operational Firepower

Our operating team partners with portfolio leadership
on strategic priorities — from sales execution to
product roadmap and beyond.

02
Founder-Aligned Structure

We invest majority capital while empowering
founders to realize their vision. Our founders have
meaningful skin in the game—when we win, they win.

03
Speed Without Shortcuts

We move fast without dragging companies through
red tape or bureaucracy. Decisions are clear,
timelines are short, and results are measurable.

04
Strategic Growth Support

From M&A strategy and go-to-market scaling to
payments expertise, we provide targeted,
experience-backed support across every deal life-
cycle.
